Package com.advertisementproject.campaignservice.exception.handler

Class CustomRestExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
com.advertisementproject.campaignservice.exception.handler.CustomRestExceptionHandler
@RestControllerAdvice
public class CustomRestExceptionHandler
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
Exception handler to provide more clear information to the api user when exceptions occur. Exceptions thrown during a controller request will return an ApiError response object in a response entity.

  • Field Summary
